snippet: A panel of financial experts praised the Vatican, but said its efforts regarding transparency and money laundering could be better.
abstract: Moneyval report says the Vatican is mostly compliant with international transparency and anti-money-laundering standards, but its bank still lags in monitoring suspicious activities or carrying out sufficient due diligence.
lead_paragraph: A panel of financial experts praised the Vatican, but said its efforts regarding transparency and money laundering could be better.

headline.main: Report Sees Flaws in Workings of the Vatican Bank
headline.print_headline: Report Sees Flaws in Workings of the Vatican Bank
